public interface GridSwapSpaceSpi
extends GridSpi, GridSpiJsonConfigurable

Method Detail

clear

void clear(String space)
           throws GridSpiException
Entirely clears data space with given name, if any.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Space name to clear

size

long size(String space)
          throws GridSpiException
Gets size in bytes for data space with given name. If specified space does not exist this method returns 0.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Space name to get size for.
Returns:
Size in bytes.

count

int count(String space)
          throws GridSpiException
Gets number of stored entries (keys) in data space with given name. If specified space does not exist this method returns 0.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Space name to get number of entries for.
Returns:
Number of stored entries in specified space.

totalSize

long totalSize()
Gets storage total size.

Returns:
Total size.

totalCount

long totalCount()
Gets total number of entries (keys) in the swap storage.

Returns:
Total number of entries in the swap storage.

read

@Nullable
GridSwapByteArray read(String space,
                                GridSwapByteArray key)
                       throws GridSpiException
Reads stored value as array of bytes by key from data space with given name. If specified space does not exist this method returns null.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Name of the data space to read from.
key - Key used to read value from data space.
Returns:
Value as array of bytes stored in specified data space that matches to given key.

readAll

Map<GridSwapByteArray,GridSwapByteArray> readAll(String space,
                                                 Iterable<GridSwapByteArray> keys)
                                                 throws GridSpiException
Reads stored values as array of bytes by all passed keys from data space with given name. If specified space does not exist this method returns empty map.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Name of the data space to read from.
keys - Keys used to read values from data space.
Returns:
Map in which keys are the ones passed into method and values are corresponding values read from swap storage.

remove

boolean remove(String space,
               GridSwapByteArray key,
               @Nullable
               GridInClosure<GridSwapByteArray> c)
               throws GridSpiException
Removes value stored in data space with given name corresponding to specified key.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Space name to remove value from.
key - Key to remove value in the specified space for.
c - Optional closure that takes removed value and executes after actual removing. If there was no value in storage the closure is not executed..
Returns:
true if value was actually removed, false otherwise.

removeAll

void removeAll(String space,
               Collection<GridSwapByteArray> keys,
               @Nullable
               GridInClosure2<GridSwapByteArray,GridSwapByteArray> c)
               throws GridSpiException
Removes values stored in data space with given name corresponding to specified keys.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Space name to remove values from.
keys - Keys to remove value in the specified space for.
c - Optional closure that takes removed value and executes after actual removing.

store

void store(String space,
           GridSwapByteArray key,
           @Nullable
           GridSwapByteArray val)
           throws GridSpiException
Stores value as array of bytes with given key into data space with given name.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Space name to store key-value pair into.
key - Key to store given value for. This key can be used further to read or remove stored value.
val - Some value as array of bytes to store into specified data space.

storeAll

void storeAll(String space,
              Map<GridSwapByteArray,GridSwapByteArray> pairs)
              throws GridSpiException
Stores key-value pairs (both keys and values are arrays of bytes) into data space with given name.

Throws:
GridSpiException - In case of any errors.
Parameters:
space - Space name to store key-value pairs into.
pairs - Map of stored key-value pairs where each one is an array of bytes.
